alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:18PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clayton and east central Fayette Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 717 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Union, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elgin around 735 PM CDT. Volga around 750 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Volga River State Park, Wadena, Brainard, Gunder, Albany, and Highland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
